name: Cannonade (Mad, Neil)
description:
Protect your fishing boats from deadly pirates as they take their loads back to port! Guide fishing boats to the best fishing spots and then back to port to unload their cargo.

Note: Occasionally on start, ships can spawn on top of each other and die instantly. If this happens, reload the game to get better positioning.

Caution! Your ships can run into each other and the island.

Controls: Click and drag on a friendly ship or fishing boat to draw the path it should follow.

Created in less than 8 hours for MiniJam 108. Unfortunately, no scoring or Game Over mechanism -- if you lose your boats or ships, it's game over!
